ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:19:56 [Issue ID 4000-716871] urn:comicvine:4000-716871 urn:comixology:799436 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 21:59:49. [Issue ID 2094545]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Liesel Van Helsing returns in a brand new series that is set to shake the inventive huntress to her core. A mysterious being, hell-bent on revenge, rises from Helsing's long forgotten past with secrets that could very well destroy Helsing and all she holds dear. Don't miss this exciting new series written by fan-favorite Wonderland writer, Raven Gregory, and artist extraordinaire, Allan Otero! Van Helsing vs Dracula's Daughter #1 Blank Sketch Cover F also Available!
